text: Manji or mangi may mean: * Japanese name for the 卍 character (Chinese: wàn), see swastika * Manji (era), a Japanese era name from 1658 to 1661 * type of raised bed similar to a cot in India or Pakistan ;In popular culture * In The Legend of Zelda for the NES, level 3 from quest 1 is designed and named after the manji symbol. * In the Tekken series of video games the Manji Party is led by the ninja Yoshimitsu. * The Soul Calibur game series also features a Manji organization. * One of the NPCs in the role-playing game MapleStory is named Manji.
title: Manji
